Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign S.1218 and A.1790, legislation that would link income threshold increases for the senior citizen rent increase exemption (SCRIE) program to changes in the consumer price index.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Link income threshold increases for the senior citizen rent increase exemption (SCRIE) program to changes in the consumer price index. (S.1218 and A.1790)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign S.1218 and A.1790, legislation that would link income threshold increases for the senior citizen rent increase exemption (SCRIE) program to changes in the consumer price index.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Link income threshold increases for the senior citizen rent increase exemption (SCRIE) program to changes in the consumer price index. (S.1218 and A.1790)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.
